infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to upload images.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to your camera to take photos.
infoPlist.NSDocumentsFolderUsageDescription: This app needs access to your documents to upload files.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to your location to help you select your restaurant location.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app needs access to your location to help you select your restaurant location.
